name: Madrid
description: Madrid is the capital and most populous city of Spain.

name: Barcelona
description: Barcelona is a city on the coast of northeastern Spain.

name: Seville
description: Seville is the capital and largest city of the Spanish autonomous community of Andalusia and the province of Seville.

name: Málaga
description: Málaga is a municipality of Spain, capital of the Province of Málaga, in the autonomous community of Andalusia.

name: Valencia
description: Valencia is the capital of the autonomous community of Valencia and the third-most populated municipality in Spain.
